entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `await foreach` utilizing struct enumerator never ends #72820
  • Likely unexpected breaking change introduced recently for `await using` #72819
  • Autocomplete for `/** */` Documentation Comments #72815
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Print diagnostics in invariant culture (English error messages) in assert text #72816
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Experimental idea: Remove the global file-path-to-document-ids map at the solution level. #72792
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2418390 #72813
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reapply "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Produce a warning for redundant patterns #69698
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Rename UI to accommodate for getting suggestions automatically #72790
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
